data.name: Tyd wag vir Niemand
data.detailed_description:
Update Notes

v0.6: Additions: -New Saving Structure -Control Mapper Options have been added Fixes: -Glitch that prevented the following level after the Ship Level from loading has been fixed Next Update: -Another batch of new levels -Story Integration


About the Game

Manipulate time to your will at any moment to solve challenges, avoid deadly traps and make it to the end of this strange journey. Tyd wag vir Niemand is an indie abstract adventure filled with mystical environments that will put your abilities to the test and engage you in a world of mystery and wonder. Features: -Large, abstract environments -Fun, tricky obstacles -Exploration -Platforming -Traps
data.about_the_game:
Manipulate time to your will at any moment to solve challenges, avoid deadly traps and make it to the end of this strange journey.

Tyd wag vir Niemand is an indie abstract adventure filled with mystical environments that will put your abilities to the test and engage you in a world of mystery and wonder.

Features:

-Large, abstract environments
-Fun, tricky obstacles
-Exploration
-Platforming
-Traps
data.short_description: Manipulate time to your will at any moment to solve challenges, avoid deadly traps and make it to the end of this strange journey.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 32-bit
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 8800 OR ATI Radeon HD 3870 OR equivalent/higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 OR AMD Radeon HD 5770 OR equivalent/higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX El Capitan
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 8800 OR ATI Radeon HD 3870 OR equivalent/higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Mac OSX compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX El Capitan
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 OR AMD Radeon HD 5770 OR equivalent/higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Mac OSX compatible

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Trusty Tahr (Steam OS not yet tested)
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 8800 OR ATI Radeon HD 3870 OR equivalent/higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Linux compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Trusty Tahr (Steam OS not yet tested)
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 460 OR AMD Radeon HD 5770 OR equivalent/higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Linux compatible
